subtests.message: assert_throws_js: Unterminated utf-8 sequence should throw if fatal flag is set function "function () { [native code] }" threw object "ReferenceError: TextDecoder is not defined" ("ReferenceError") expected instance of function "function TypeError() { [native code] }" ("TypeError")

subtests.name: Fatal flag: utf-8 - invalid code
subtests.message: assert_throws_js: function "function () { [native code] }" threw object "ReferenceError: TextDecoder is not defined" ("ReferenceError") expected instance of function "function TypeError() { [native code] }" ("TypeError")
